text: Spiez is a municipality in Frutigen-Niedersimmental in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. It is on the Lake Thun. ==Gallery== File:Spiez.JPG|Spiez File:Spiez Luftaufnahme 2.jpg|Spiez from the air, with the lake in the background and the Kander bottom left File:Schloss Spiez.jpg|Spiez Castle File:Spiez railway station.jpg|Spiez train station ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of the city of Spiez * Category:Municipalities in Frutigen-Niedersimmental Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Spiez
